name: Merzehal
description: The Ancient Dragon who has lived for millennia. His wisdom is matched only by his devastating power.

name: Bovinari
description: A beast of primal rage. Its horns are said to pierce through the toughest armor.

name: Walican
description: The ancient golem of the cliffs. It stands as a testament to a forgotten age of stone and magic.

name: Kuzto
description: The keeper of the labyrinth. He traps wanderers in endless mazes of despair.

name: Xyvio
description: The Thunder Emperor who commands the storms. His lightning strikes without warning.
